title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama GitHub repo providing the CLI and server to pull, create, and run large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama: chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Bun, and modern browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLMs, embeddings, and tool-callers inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama; no-code install via Docker Compose.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API, streaming, and embedding support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem wrapping Ollama’s REST API for Rails and scripting.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI chat client with conversation history and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) with one-line run commands and CUDA support.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models for generative QA and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET SDK for Ollama with async streaming and dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-codex
summary: Drop-in open-source replacement for GitHub Copilot using Ollama CodeLlama models.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Flutter desktop app for chatting with Ollama models on Windows/macOS/Linux.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package and NixOS module for reproducible Ollama deployments.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate for Ollama with Tokio and SSE streaming support.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app exposing Ollama models via REST and WebSocket channels.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot bringing local LLM chat to any server using Ollama.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir OTP library for Ollama with GenServer-backed connection pooling and LiveView hooks.
